Class AirPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • AirPlane

  • public class AirPlane
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a blueprint for an AirPlane object. It requires a Pilot object.
    Since:
    30/03/2018

      • getMake

        public java.lang.String getMake()
        This method returns the make of a plane assigned in the constructor. make of a plane is the type.
        Returns:
        make (String)

      • getModel

        public java.lang.String getModel()
        This method returns the model of a plane assigned in the constructor. model of a plane is usually the number attached to it.
        Returns:
        model (String)

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()
        This method returns the capacity of a plane assigned in the constructor. capacity of a plane is how many seats it has.
        Returns:
        capacity (String)

      • assignPilot

        public Pilot assignPilot(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String rating)
        This method creates a Pilot Object. It takes two parameters: 1st Parameter: name which is the name of the pilot. 2nd Parameter: rating which is the type of plane the pilot is qualified to fly. Then, it returns the pilot.
        Parameters:
        name - (String)
        rating - (String)
        Returns:
        p (Pilot)

      • getPilot

        public Pilot getPilot()
        This method returns the pilot object created in the method assignPilot which took two parameters.
        Returns:
        pilot (Pilot)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method overrides the toString method in the Object class. It returns useful information about an airplane.

        a string representation.
